quotes.message: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Instead of hating, I have chosen to forgive and spend all of my positive energy on changing the world.
quotes.name: Camryn Manheim

quotes.message: Life gets easier if you choose only to think, act and speak positive energy. Choose to be the light in somebody else's darkness.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Positive energy knows no boundaries. If everyone were to spread positive energy on the Internet, the world would be a much better place.
quotes.name: Lu Wei

quotes.message: I believe that positive energy and optimism help us to take up any challenge in life and to succeed in even the most difficult tasks. I also believe that positive energy is contagious: we can transmit it to others.
quotes.name: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

quotes.message: Today, I will focus on the positive energy I possess, and let the power of love and light illuminate my soul.
quotes.name: Melanie Moushigian Koulouris

quotes.message: If you're not positive energy, you're negative energy.
quotes.name: Mark Cuban

quotes.message: The positive energy you bring here, makes the world a better place, you know it.
quotes.name: Vin Diesel

quotes.message: I have a positive energy except when I'm depressed mad or hungry.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: People like to be around those who give off positive energy.
quotes.name: Erin Heatherton

quotes.message: There's a direct correlation between positive energy and positive results.
quotes.name: Joe Rogan

quotes.message: Positive energy is attracted to positive energy.
quotes.name: Deborah

quotes.message: The positive energy and love we give to others, heals our own wounds.
quotes.name: Angie karan

quotes.message: Surround yourself with positive energy.Good vibes translates into good moods and better health all around.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Without feeling negative energy, we would not know what positive energy is. Acknowledge, understand and give love.
quotes.name: Kishan S Chauhan

quotes.message: Some people emit negative fumes, while others vibrate POSITIVE ENERGY. Stay close to the Positive ones; otherwise you will be smoked to death.
quotes.name: RVM

quotes.message: Happy Friday! You're responsible for the energy of your day.
quotes.name: Tracey Edmonds

quotes.message: If you have positive energy you will always attract positive outcomes.
quotes.name: Steve Backley

quotes.message: I know that positive energy begets positive energy.
quotes.name: Joshua Radin

quotes.message: The worst times can be the best if you think with positive energy.
quotes.name: Domenico Dolce

quotes.message: Release positive energy & you will receive it. You have to give people the benefit of the doubt & know that everything happens for a reason.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Energy is equal to desire and purpose.
quotes.name: Sheryl Adams

quotes.message: Everything around us is made up of energy. To attract positive things in your life, start by giving off positive energy.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The longer I live, the more I am certain that the great difference between the great and insignificant is energy - invincible determination - a purpose once fixed and then death or victory.
quotes.name: Sir Thomas Fowell Buxton

quotes.message: I've always been able to transform happiness and pain and sorrow and tears into positive energy.
quotes.name: Thalia

quotes.message: External sources of positive energy and motivation will exhaust, unless we have our captive generation of positive energy.The only sustainable source of positive energy is our thoughts.
quotes.name: Sukant Ratnakar

quotes.message: Positive energy evokes more energy, more initiative, and more happiness.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If you want to attract positive things into your life, then begin now by spreading positive energy about.
quotes.name: Lynda Field

quotes.message: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It's very simple.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho
